name: Clock of your life
description:
Game created for Ludum Dare 44 Theme: Your life is currency.

This game isn’t fun… also it’s boring and repetitive…

but so is Your life.

How would you spend hours of your life?

This game was created to make you think about your life decisions.

Hours of Your Life are valuable.

Don’t waste them.

!! (Please don’t quit. Play game until you waste all Health) !!

"Free Booze patch" notes:

- fixed bug when you can buy stuff with 0 money!
